product.description: Virtual Barber Shop is an application that allows users to virtually try on different hairstyles to see which one suits them best before committing to a real haircut.

features.name: Hairstyle Preview
features.description: Enables users to visualize various hairstyles on themselves.

features.name: Suitability Assessment
features.description: Helps users determine which hairstyles are most flattering.

product.targeted_market: Individuals considering a new haircut or hairstyle, particularly those who are unsure about how a new style will look on them.
product.problem_product_is_solving: The uncertainty and potential regret associated with choosing a new hairstyle, saving users time and money by allowing them to make informed decisions before visiting a barber or stylist.
